item.title: Report E-2025010366
item.description:
Report E-2025010366

Identified by scraper @ 2025-01-31T00:56:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2025-01-02
  • City: JOHNSTON
  • State: RI
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: A. DUIE PYLE INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: When loading freight into a trailer a pail that was already loaded and staged in the trailer was found slightly leaking. Although it was not directly observed, it appeared that the pail was struck and punctured by other freight and as a result contributed to the unintentional release. Spilled material was cleaned with absorbent and placed into a recovery container as was the punctured pail.
